Meet David, a Kenyan man whose life was destroyed by TB. He got healthy thanks to U.S. aid--but cuts to that aid put many lives at risk. - Bill Gates

Over the past 25 years, Gavi has saved 19 million lives. Everywhere I go, I’m making the case that there is no better investment in our future. - Bill Gates
JUST THE FACTSHealth aid saves lives. Don’t cut it.Here’s the proof I’m showing Congress. - Bill Gates
